articles.author: Steven Ewing
articles.title: 2023 BMW X7 First Drive Review: Don't Focus on Its Face - CNET
articles.description: With new mild-hybrid engines and the latest active safety tech, the 2023 BMW X7 is an incredibly compelling luxury SUV -- if you can get past its styling.
articles.content: The BMW X7's facelift might be you-ain't-got-no-alibi ugly, but the rest of this SUV's 2023 model year updates more than make up for its questionable styling. New mild-hybrid engines, a swanky interi… [+5170 chars]
